title: Senior Python Developer
description: We are looking for an experienced Python developer with 5+ years expertise in Django, FastAPI, and cloud technologies. You will lead a team of engineers and drive architectural decisions for our microservices platform.

title: React Frontend Developer
description: Build amazing web applications with React, TypeScript, and modern frontend tools. Join our team of creative engineers building next-generation user experiences.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Develop and deploy machine learning models using TensorFlow, PyTorch, and cloud infrastructure. Work on cutting-edge AI solutions for enterprise clients.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and deployment automation. We're looking for someone passionate about infrastructure as code.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Build end-to-end web applications using modern tech stack. Work in a fast-paced startup environment with amazing growth opportunities.

title: Data Engineer
description: Build data pipelines and infrastructure for analytics at scale. Process billions of events daily using modern data technologies.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Design and implement scalable microservices architecture. Work with distributed systems and solve complex technical challenges.

title: Cloud Architect
description: Design cloud-native solutions and lead architecture decisions. Mentor junior engineers and drive technical excellence.
